titleStmt.title: The mutual duties of elders and people Delivered in a discourse at Beckles in Suffolk, Octob. 13. 1697. At the setting apart of Mr. John Killinghal, to the office of an elder, over a Church of Christ there. By John Stackhouse, elder of a Church of Christ in Norwich.
titleStmt.author: Stackhouse, John, dissenting minister.

publicationStmt.publisher: printed by Tho. Snowden, for Edward Giles, bookseller in Norwich, near the Market-Place,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
